Description: Schedule Initial Status Meeting and alert personnel
Content: Organize an immediate meeting with all key stakeholders, including upper management and relevant department heads, to discuss the current situation, share initial findings, and outline next steps.
Identify the system that has been compromised.
Assess the initial scope and impact of the system compromise on systems, data and operations.

Description: Assess financial impact and risk exposure
Content: Estimate the financial implications of the attack, considering factors such as potential loss of revenue, remediation costs, and regulatory fines. This information will be critical in decision-making processes.
IP addresses, the domain, network logs, etc.
What was the attack vector behind the attack?

Description: Locate Business-Continuity plan for restoring the system
Content: Locate plan and start preparing for restoring the system.
